name: Demon Engines
description:
Ancient machine demons awoken by nuclear war prey on the last surviving people. Remaining survivors must build powerful vehicles to rival the machine demons might.

Combine powerful item effects and build a vehicle to fit your play style. Slay cultists and demons in a post-apocalyptic world

Hey! I'm working on game concepts. I've been working on this prototype for 6 months and I'm long overdue to start testing.  This is super early state so expect some bugs

You can help me by letting me know if you loved or hated the game, honest feedback. Thanks for your help!
